cochar.cochar module¶

Call of Cthulhu character generator

Example:

>>> Character()
class cochar.cochar.Character(year: int = 1925, age: Optional[str] = None, sex: Optional[str] = None, first_name: Optional[str] = None, last_name: Optional[str] = None, country: str = 'US', occupation: str = 'optimal', weights: bool = True)¶

filter_skills(_skills: dict)¶

Filter out all skills with basic value form given dict.

>>>example_dict = {‘psychoanalysis’: 1, ‘language (spanish)’: 66} >>>filter_skills(example_dict) {‘language (spanish)’: 66}
